msbt.message: I know there's something I've been dying to talk to you about, but I just can't remember what it is Isn't that weird? I'll probably think of it right after you walk away.
Oh no. I can't believe thisSomehow I completely forgot what it was that I've been waiting to ask you about when I ran into you!
Oh! You made me forget what I was worrying about just now. Thanks!
Well, how about that? Seeing your face made me forget all my worries!
